The Commons petition of long afflicted England to the chiefe chancellor of heaven and onely ivdge of Earth with his gracious answere thereto. C. I.
[8] p.
Printed for Iohn Hammond, London : 1642.
In verse. "Published by C.I. Benefit of all True affected Christians. Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
